title: Pixel 4 XL - Green vertical line on Display screen?
content:
received my Pixel4 XL today from a pre-order and unboxed it with over-excitement only to find out the screen has welcomed me with  a green vertical line on its display. 

Upon talking to support they wanted me to place a new phone order again and return this defect piece. What if I get a similar device again?? Did I just spend 2500 CAD on my Pixel4 xl purchase?  So much for a pre-order purchase. Did I trust the teampixel too much?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
